thread.title: Washington State graduate Anthony Ha appointed GM at Hyatt Regency Suzhou
thread.title_full: Washington State graduate Anthony Ha appointed GM at Hyatt Regency Suzhou

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Washington State graduate Anthony Ha appointed GM at Hyatt Regency Suzhou
text:
Washington State graduate Anthony Ha appointed GM at Hyatt Regency Suzhou   
Aug 17, 2015 eTN   
Anthony Ha has been appointed general manager of Hyatt Regency Suzhou and area vice president, effective August 1, 2015. 
A graduate of Washington State University, Mr. Ha began his career with Hyatt in 1986 at Hyatt Regency San Francisco, followed by an assignment at Hyatt Regency Macau. After that, Mr. Ha worked with various hotels in mainland China, Hong Kong and Micronesia before rejoining the Hyatt family in February 2011. He became the opening general manager for Hyatt Regency Qingdao in August 2011 and subsequently assumed the position of area vice president in April 2015. 
"It has been a great pleasure to work with such a talented team at Hyatt Regency Qingdao over the past four years, and I am looking forward to leading a new team at Hyatt Regency Suzhou and the other hotels in my area of responsibility," Mr. Ha said. 
In his free time, Mr. Ha enjoys cycling and playing golf. He speaks English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Vietnamese.
